name: mess manager web app
description: "Mess Manager" is a MERN stack project that simplifies expense management for shared living. It enables users to create accounts, track shared expenses, split bills, and generate reports. With React, Express.js, MongoDB, and Node.js, it offers a seamless solution for efficient financial management among roommates or shared households.

name: Musion â€“ Gardening and Landscaping Bootstrap5 Template
description: Welcome to my web developer portfolio site! Here, you'll find a unique website project that revolves around gardening and a digital library. This engaging website combines my passion for web development with my love for nature and knowledge. Explore the beautifully designed interface as you dive into a rich collection of gardening resources, from plant care guides to landscaping inspiration. Immerse yourself in an intuitive user experience that showcases my expertise in front-end development, responsive design, and interactive features. Join me on this digital journey, where technology meets the beauty of nature and learning.
